entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sprague 5:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: E 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
